project.teaser: 3rdAI is the worlds first research-grade Playlist Generatora tool that combines the granular detail of user-defined searches across our specialist-curated, semantically-tagged 450,000+ track lyrical corpus with the machine learning features of our hip hop-savvy AI. Over the...
project.objective:
3rdAI is the worlds first research-grade Playlist Generatora tool that combines the granular detail of user-defined searches across our specialist-curated, semantically-tagged 450,000+ track lyrical corpus with the machine learning features of our hip hop-savvy AI. Over the course of our cultural data analytics research on the ERC project, CIPHER: Hip Hop Interpellation (globalcipher.org), we identified that with the development of our 3rdAI Research Engine we had laid the groundwork for a commercializable and sustainable, AI-assisted Playlist Generator tool, profits from which could fund CIPHERs global hip hop research, community engagement projects, and landmark OA scholarly publicationslike the CIPHER journal, Global Hip Hop Studiesin perpetuity. Scaffolded atop our powerful Research Engine, the 3rdAI Playlist Generator will create synergies between our intended research applications and the massive market for streaming music discovery via bespoke sentiment analysis and recommender systems tools.
The 3rdAI Playlist Generator thus revolutionizes the streaming and playlisting industries, bringing our next-level analysis of the archetypes and intertexts of thisthe worlds most popular musicto the public. As outlined in our business plan, with 3rdAI, you can now search forand visualize over time and spacehip hops multilingual, deeply intertextual references to war, peace, crime, community, migration, home, and any verbatim or thematically-related concepts you want to explore. But more than that, with the AI-assisted features of the 3rdAI Playlist Generator, now you can sonify your searches, uncovering and exploring the evolution of lyrics, beats, and themes through playlists that take you on a tour of hip hop history from Straight Outta Compton (Los Angeles, 1988) to Gully Boy (Mumbai, 2019) and beyond. Indeed, the name 3rdAI plays on a gem of hip hop knowledge, the 3rd eye of hip hop consciousnessthe oft-referenced archetype of hip hop insight.
project.title: 3rdAI Playlist Generator
project.keywords: Hip Hop, Mapping, Music, Data Analytics, Recommender Systems, Playlisting

article.title: Revolutionising music discovery with AI-driven playlists

category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: HORIZON ERC Proof of Concept Grants
category.description: HORIZON ERC Proof of Concept Grants
